sermons.title: Birthing the Authentic
sermons.description: Everything that pertains to God's glory must be birthed from above. The birth of Jesus is the ultimate pattern of the advent of the authentic thing and it behooves us, therefore to understand the phenomenon of birth in all of its organic and painful suffering.

sermons.title: Called To Authentic Christianity
sermons.description: Brother K.P. speaks of brokenness and walking with the Lord in true authentic Christianity and humility. He speaks on the Scripture passage in Mark on taking up the cross and denying self. This message is full of powerful exhortations of a true authentic walk with Jesus Christ. You will be challenged to follow the Lord in the way of discipleship with Jesus Christ.

sermons.title: The Real or the Plastic?
sermons.description: Devastated by what took place while visiting a ‘Jesus Rally,’ Art opens up and lays bare the issue of authentic repentance.
